original_title: Special train services introduced for the April Holiday Season
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Railways announced that special train services will be in operation for the April holiday season.
These special train services will be in operation from 4th to 17th April, in addition to the regular train services.
